architectural_notes: Withdrawal flow should include a selectable list of all Nigerian banks (kept up to date via a reliable data source/API).

existing_features.title: Create a maintained static list of Nigerian banks in the frontend and use it as the selectable options source for payout-method creation.

Update the payout-method creation UI in the "Send to Bank" sheet to select a Nigerian bank from a dropdown (with search) instead of free-text entry, while still storing the selected bank name in the existing payout method fields.

Update the payout-method creation UI on the Withdrawals page to select a Nigerian bank from a dropdown (with search) instead of free-text entry, while preserving the existing backend payload shape (bankName/accountName/accountNumber).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add support for withdrawals to Nigerian bank accounts by making all Nigerian banks available for user selection

projectName: Add full Nigerian bank list for bank-withdrawal payout method selection
